class kamal.metrics.stream_metrics.NormalPredictionMetrics(thresholds)¶

Bases: kamal.metrics.stream_metrics.StreamMetricsBase

This metric is used in surface normal prediction task.

Parameters:

  • thresholds (list of float)

get_results()¶
Returns:

  • mean angle

  • median angle

  • precents for angle within thresholds

  • targets: $(N, 3, H, W)$.

  • masks: $(N, 1, H, W)$.

class kamal.metrics.stream_metrics.DepthEstimationMetrics(thresholds, ignore_index=0)¶

Bases: kamal.metrics.stream_metrics.StreamMetricsBase

This metric is used in depth prediction task.

Parameters:

  • thresholds (list of float)

  • ignore_index (int, optional): Value to ignore.

get_results()¶
Returns:

  • absolute relative error

  • squared relative error

  • precents for $r$ within thresholds: Where $r_i = max(preds_i/targets_i, targets_i/preds_i)$
